pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package bundles the minified <https://github.com/danielgindi/jquery.dgtable jquery.dgtable> code into a Haskell package, so it can be depended upon by Cabal packages. The first three components of the version number match the upstream jquery.dgtable version. The package is designed to meet the redistribution requirements of downstream users (e.g. Debian).
